verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Maschil. <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he whose <S%H6588>transgression<s%> is <S%H5375>forgiven<s%>, Whose <S%H2401>sin<s%> is <S%H3680>covered<s%>.
Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> unto whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2803>imputeth<s%> not <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, And in whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> there is no <S%H7423>guile<s%>.
When I kept <S%H2790>silence<s%>, my <S%H6106>bones<s%> wasted <S%H1086>away<s%> Through my <S%H7581>groaning<s%> all the day <S%H3117>long<s%>.

For <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> upon <S%H3955>me<s%>: My moisture was <S%H2015>changed<s%> as with the <S%H2725>drought<s%> of <S%H7019>summer<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

I <S%H3045>acknowledged<s%> my <S%H2403>sin<s%> unto <S%H5771>thee<s%>, And mine iniquity did I not <S%H3680>hide<s%>: I <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H3034>confess<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; And thou <S%H5375>forgavest<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of my <S%H2403>sin<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

For this let every one that is <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto thee in a <S%H6256>time<s%> when thou mayest be <S%H4672>found<s%>: Surely when the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7858>overflow<s%> they shall not reach unto <S%H5060>him<s%>.

Thou art my <S%H5643>hiding-place<s%>; Thou wilt <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me from <S%H6862>trouble<s%>; Thou wilt <S%H5437>compass<s%> me about with <S%H7438>songs<s%> of <S%H6405>deliverance<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

I will <S%H7919>instruct<s%> thee and <S%H3384>teach<s%> thee in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H3212>go<s%>: I will <S%H3289>counsel<s%> thee with mine eye upon <S%H5869>thee<s%>.

Be ye not as the <S%H5483>horse<s%>, or as the <S%H6505>mule<s%>, which have no <S%H995>understanding<s%>; Whose <S%H5716>trappings<s%> must be <S%H4964>bit<s%> and <S%H7448>bridle<s%> to <S%H1102>hold<s%> them <S%H1077>in<s%>, Else they will not come near unto <S%H7126>thee<s%>.

Many <S%H7227><s%> <S%H4341>sorrows<s%> shall be to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; But he that <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> shall compass him <S%H5437>about<s%>.
Be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>, ye <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; And <S%H7442>shout<s%> for <S%H3477>joy<s%>, all ye that are upright in <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
